VIII.iv.8.D.1.a
.
Temporary Total Evaluations Under a DC for a Defined Period
The rating schedule prescribes temporary 100-percent evaluations under various diagnostic codes (DCs) for definite periods of time followingÂ treatment (including hospitalization), surgery, or certain significant disease manifestations.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section D - Other Temporary Total Evaluations
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section D
